message.body: I'm working it out where I'm able to see doubt!! I mapquested it, and it's not that bad of a ride for me. Like 2 hours. Not sure yet what day. Either the Thursday or the Sunday. July 11 or 15, depending on a few factors. Not sure as time gets closer if u want me to ask ur dad?
Ok, are u sure it's only 2 hours? ? Thought it was more. ..
You have to remember, I'm practically near new york. For you, maybe 3 and a half hours.
Ok. I think you can stay over with me :) just don't come sat, bc my mom is :/
I'm going to go home the same day. Where are you staying? Hotel?
Actor housing. Probably a big house with other actors.
Let me know if you want me to ask your dad? I'm either going Thursday or Sunday. Depending on stuff
U can ask him, I'm sure he'd love to go. Or I can ask him if u want. U wouldn't mind?

Not at all. Let me see what day I can make it. I can order the tickets online, we will just tell your dad you got the tickets. I know he doesn't have funds. You can tell dad either Thursday or Monday. Will Susan be gone by Sunday? Do you think your coming to driftwood? I saw on facebook that you have other plays in the works. Keep me posted.
I mean Sunday, the 15th, not Monday. Typed wrong
Ok I think I can visit the driftwood. I'm finalizing my schedules soon!
I'll give u $ for dads ticket!
What's ur fathers new number? I lost it
